place: Grand Hotel de la Poste, Rouen
author: James Joyce
text: Dear Mr Gorman: Your letter has just reached me. Will you please telegraph or write to me immediately on your arrival as I want to go to the south of France, Bordeaux, as soon as possible. I intended to go on Tuesday next as the weather here is very bad and I need a rest between one operation and [another] operation. I am here with my family. I hope you will forgive me for not having written to you before. I shall explain to you the reason when I have the pleasure of meeting you. Allow me in the meantime to express my very grateful thanks. Sincerely yours James Joyce
